description: Ground truth labels for 20 leads, manually classified as hot/warm/cold with rationale

leads.rationale: Referral from existing customer, looking for immediate possession, 2.5Cr budget, very recent activity (8 mins). Clear buying intent.
Corporate client, 5Cr commercial deal, marked as PRIORITY, 8 past interactions, wants entire floor. Enterprise deal with high value.
Ready to book with booking amount, willing to negotiate. 45 mins recent, 4 interactions, high budget 95L. Clear closing signal.
VIP foreign diplomat, embassy payment, 8 interactions, 5 mins ago activity. High-value, politically important client.
Industrialist family, 5.5Cr penthouse, 11 interactions, ASAP mentioned, 3 mins activity. Ultra high net worth, ready buyer.
Embassy-style office, 5.2Cr, TOP PRIORITY, 12 interactions, 4 mins ago. Security-critical, enterprise deal.
Booking amount ready, needs management approval (formality), 5 interactions, 35 mins ago. Deal almost closed.
IT professional relocating, needs by March urgently, 90L budget. Timeline pressure but still comparing options.
Doctor couple, weekend visit confirmed, 7 interactions, but 60 mins since activity. Good prospect but not immediate.
NRI from US, video call scheduled, good budget 1.1Cr. Interested but cross-border complications possible.
Large family, 1.1Cr budget, school proximity important, 5 interactions. Serious but family decision process is slower.
Paperwork pending, deal almost closed, loan approved. Just needs agreement signing.
Wife liked flat, husband to visit. 4 interactions, 45 mins ago. Needs both decision makers aligned.
Just browsing, not sure about timeline, maybe next year. Only 1 interaction, 3 hours ago. No urgency.
Social media lead, no response to call, 12 hours since activity, 0 interactions. Unresponsive.
College student with 25L budget in Mumbai - completely unrealistic. Not serious enquiry.
Marked as fake enquiry, same as spam caller. Invalid lead.
Wrong number provided, 3 days since activity, 0 interactions. Cannot contact.
Window shopping, will call back when ready, 16 hours since activity. No immediate intent.
Student accommodation enquiry, not genuine lead, social media source. Invalid.
